Package server

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
server.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
Controller of the game: manages the game flow

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Controller​(Game game)
    Constructor: build a Controller

    Checks if a nickname is available

      public void gameStarter() throws java.lang.InterruptedException, DisconnectionException
      Manages the whole game cards setup process from their selection to their assignment
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - When the thread is interrupted
      DisconnectionException - When the a blocking disconnection event happens

    • manageLose

      public void manageLose()
      Manages the lose of the current player: end the game or remove the player

    • gameCanStart

      public boolean gameCanStart()
      Tests if the game is ready to start and if everyone has a final nickname
      Returns:
      True if the game is ready to start

    • checkNickname

      public boolean checkNickname​(java.lang.String requestedUsername)
      Checks if a nickname is available
      Parameters:
      requestedUsername - The nickname to be checked
      Returns:
      True if the username is available, otherwise false

      Sets player info if the username is unique
      Parameters:
      nickname - The requested nickname
      birthDate - The birth date of the player
      Returns:
      True if the player has been added, otherwise false

      Parameters:
      nickname - The requested nickname
      temporaryNickname - The temporary nickname
      Returns:
      True if the player info has been updated, otherwise false

      public void setAsDisconnected​(java.lang.String nickname)

      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the disconnected user

      Checks if the game is still active
